author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
Any other CL client running their ref-test with alpha.10? We noticed a weird behaviour when upgrading where we are getting lots of failures on Deneb tests. Still not sure if it is an issue with the test vectors or not but it is weird that none of them were failing on alpha.9.

Some failures are related to block signatures, other to root mismatches. Still looking into it trying to understand what is going on ðŸ˜…
